channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- App Connect Enterprise Certified Container
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- App Connect Enterprise Certified Container

item.title: CVE-2022-22404|2024-08-03T03:14:54.916Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise%20certified%20container
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise Certified Container Dashboard UI (IBM App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 1.5, 2.0, 2.1, 3.0, and 3.1) may be vulnerable to denial of service due to excessive rate limiting.

item.title: CVE-2022-43922|2024-08-03T13:40:06.572Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise%20certified%20container
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 4.1, 4.2, 5.0, 5.1, 5.2, 6.0, 6.1, and 6.2 could disclose sensitive information to an attacker due to a weak hash of an API Key in the configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 241583.

item.title: CVE-2022-31770|2024-08-03T07:26:01.151Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise%20certified%20container
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 4.2 could allow a user from the administration console to cause a denial of service by creating a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 228221.

item.title: CVE-2022-43874|2024-08-03T13:40:06.580Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise%20certified%20container
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 4.1, 4.2, 5.0, 5.1, 5.2, 6.0, 6.1, 6.2, and 7.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 239963.
